document.full_text: israeli troops shot palestinian protesters who surged toward its frontiers with syria, lebanon and gaza on sunday, killing at least 13 people on the day palestinians mourn the establishment of israel in 1948.
document.title: israel-palestinian violence erupts on three borders
lines_and_colors: israeli troops shot palestinian protesters who surged toward its frontiers with syria, lebanon and gaza on sunday, killing at least 13 people on the day palestinians mourn the establishment of israel in 1948.
